Title: Inception
Description: A skilled thief, the absolute best in the dangerous art of extraction, steals secrets from deep within the subconcious during the dream state.

Genre.Name: Science Fiction
Genre.Description: A genre that explores imaginative and futuristic concepts, often involving advanced technology, space exploration, time travel, and extraterrestrial life. Sci-fi films challenge the boundaries of possibility and frequently address philosophical or ethical issues through speculative scenarios.

Director.Name: Christopher Nolan
Director.BIo: A British-American filmmaker known for his cerebral, nonlinear storytelling and innovative visual style. He is celebrated for movies like "Inception,"  "The Dark Knight," and "Interstellar."

Title: The Dark Knight
Description: Batman sets out to dismantle the remaining criminal organizations that plague Gotham, but the Joker thrusts him into a personal conflict.

Genre.Name: Action
Genre.Description: Movies that are characterized by intense physical activity, including fights, chases, explosions, and other dynamic sequences. The focus is on adrenaline-pumping scenes that keep the audience on the edge of their seats.

Director.Name: Christopher Nolan
Director.Bio: A British-American filmmaker known for his cerebral, nonlinear storytelling and innovative visual style. He is celebrated for movies like "Inception," "The Dark Knight," and "Interstellar."

Title: Interstellar
Description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

Title: Gladiator
Description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: Films that focus on realistic storytelling and character development, often exploring complex emotions, relationships, and situations. Dramas aim to depict real-life struggles and dilemmas, evoking empathy and thoughtfulness from the audience.

Director.Name: Ridley Scott
Director.Bio: An English director and producer renowned for his visually stunning and atmospheric films, often in the science fiction and historical drama genres. Notable works include "Gladiator," "Blade Runner," and "The Martian."

Title: Blade Runner 2049
Description: A young blade runner's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former blade runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.

Director.Name: Denis Villeneuve
Director.Bio: A Canadian director known for his visually captivating and thought-provoking films, often exploring complex themes and futuristic worlds. His acclaimed works include "Blade Runner 2049," "Arrival," and "Dune."

Title: Mad Max: Fury Road

Director.Name: George Miller
Director.Bio: An Australian filmmaker best known for creating the "Mad Max" franchise. He is celebrated for his innovative approach to action and post-apocalyptic storytelling.

Title: Schindler's List
